lessons.name: Spanish Alphabet and Pronunciation
lessons.description: Learn the Spanish alphabet and basic pronunciation rules, including vowel and consonant sounds.

lessons.name: Greetings and Introductions in Spanish
lessons.description: Learn formal and informal greetings and how to introduce yourself and others in Spanish.

lessons.name: Review of Beginner and Expanded Greetings/Farewells
lessons.description: Review beginner concepts and learn more diverse greetings, farewells, and polite phrases.

lessons.name: Regular -AR Verb Conjugation in Present Tense
lessons.description: Learn the conjugation patterns of regular -AR verbs in the present tense.

lessons.name: Review of Pre-intermediate and Thematic Vocabulary Expansion
lessons.description: Review pre-intermediate concepts and expand thematic vocabulary in various areas of daily life.

lessons.name: Preterite Tense of Irregular Verbs
lessons.description: Learn the conjugation of common irregular verbs in the preterite tense.

lessons.name: Review of Upper-intermediate and Formal Spanish
lessons.description: Review upper-intermediate concepts and focus on formal Spanish language usage, including register and style.

lessons.name: Present Perfect Subjunctive
lessons.description: Learn how to use the present perfect subjunctive.
